article.Heading: Must link employment to capital subsidy: Amit Mitra
article.Summary: In an interview to CNBC-TV18’s Shereen Bhan, Amit Mitra gave his take on Arun Jaitely’s Union Budget and his outlook on the road ahead.
article.Body:
In an interview to CNBC-TV18’s Shereen Bhan, Amit Mitra gave his take on Arun Jaitely’s Union Budget and his outlook on the road ahead.

For entire discussion, watch accompanying videos...
